DOC.detailed_description: This prospective Randomized Controlled Trial ( RCT ) , compare experimental group ( EG ) , submit PNE/HyP base psychological intervention , control group ( CG ) , submit usual treatment care . After recruitment evaluation inclusion/exclusion criterion , patient enter study sign Informed Consent . Baseline evaluation perform 1 month pre-surgery , afterwards , patient randomly assign EG ( PNE+Hyp plus usual care ) CG ( usual care ) . The EG submit 3 pre-surgical 1 ( 2 ) post-surgical reinforcement session . At 1 month post-surgery , intervention group subdivide participant randomly assign receive reinforcement session intervention point . The psychological intervention session base educative principle Pain Neuroscience Education Hypnosis strategies promotion pain control , positive coping strategy psychological variable . Patients evaluate 6 moment : T0 - baseline , 1 month pre surgery ; T1 - post intervention/24h surgery ; T2 - 72h post-surgery ; T3 - 1 month post surgery ; T4 - 6 month post surgery ; T5 - 12 month post intervention .
